item.description:
Everyone,

All are welcome to join us on Saturday, 2PM @ Cambridge Common for flag-football. We welcome all players, regardless of skill level. We want to have fun, and we want you to have fun as well. There are a group of regulars that have a great time every week, and we're always looking for fresh faces. Whether you would like to get out to play flag-football, just want to exercise, or want to meet new people - this is a great opportunity. Weather conditions are not regarded on Saturdays. We will play - rain or shine, snow or wind. I'm excited for this Saturday, and I hope to see you.

-Cambrdige Flag-Footballer
item.name: Flag Football - Sat - 2PM - Cambridge Common
